Package com.brinybeach.tinywebserver

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    The main entry point for the TinyWebServer application.
    HttpConnectionRunner
    Handle Web requests on a single socket InputStream and write the response to the socket OutputStream.
    HttpFileManager
    Return attributes of file in the file system and map file extensions to mime types.
    HttpRequest
    Wrap the parsed request attributes received from the Web client.
    HttpRequestHandlerFactory
    This is used to scan classes in a package and build a Map of clases instances and methods that may be called to handle different Web contexts and return dynamic content.
    HttpRequestParser
    A recursive descent parser that parses characters from an InputStream according to the HTTP specification.
    HttpResponse
    Wrap the HTTP response attributes.
    HttpResponseRules
    Implements the rules found in the HTTP RFC specification.
    HttpServerRunner
    Accepts connections on the specified port and creates a new HttpConnectionRunner to handle each connection recieved.
    StatsController
    The one dynamic Web content generator in the TinyWebServer.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    HttpController
    This Annotation is used to mark classes that contain @HttpRequestMethod methods.
    HttpRequestHandler
    This annotation is used to mark the method used to generation dynamic content.
